\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 61643}

\subsection*{Surprises Me Every Time}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Hoodlem}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated & smoked & Yarrow & plant material\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I used yarrow instead of tobacco for a mix 1 day and found myself in a real relaxed state. I have tryed it by it's self and felt a slight relaxed feeling but I get the same if I drink it as a tea as well. Since then if I don't have any tobacco I use yarrow and it surprises me every time.
